verses.verse: וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh, Then I looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in הָרָקִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H7549><s%> ha-ra-Ki-a' and behold in the firmament אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that was עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh that was above the head הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim, of the cherubims כְּאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> ke-'E-ven stone סַפִּ֔יר <S%H5601><s%> sap-Pir, over them as it were a sapphire כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> ke-mar-'Eh as the appearance דְּמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut of the likeness כִּסֵּ֑א <S%H3678><s%> kis-Se; of a throne נִרְאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah there appeared עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. above

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish unto the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> le-Vush clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim, with linen וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said בֹּא֩ <S%H935><s%> bo Go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּינ֨וֹת <S%H996><s%> bei-Not between לַגַּלְגַּ֜ל <S%H1534><s%> lag-gal-Gal the wheels אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under לַכְּר֗וּב <S%H3742><s%> lak-ke-Ruv, [even] under the cherub וּמַלֵּ֨א <S%H4390><s%> u-mal-Le and fill חָפְנֶ֤יךָ <S%H2651><s%> cha-fe-Nei-cha thine hand גַֽחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> ga-cha-lei- with coals אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh of fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> mib-bei-Not from between לַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> lak-ke-ru-Vim, the cherubims וּזְרֹ֖ק <S%H2236><s%> u-ze-Rok and scatter עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir; [them] over the city וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And he went in לְעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nai. in my sight

וְהַכְּרֻבִ֗ים <S%H3742><s%> ve-hak-ke-ru-Vim, Now the cherubims עֹֽמְדִ֛ים <S%H5975><s%> 'o-me-Dim stood מִימִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-Min on the right side לַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> lab-Ba-yit of the house בְּבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O went in הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish; when the man וְהֶעָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> ve-he-'a-Nan and the cloud מָלֵ֔א <S%H4390><s%> ma-Le, filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer court הַפְּנִימִֽית׃ <S%H6442><s%> hap-pe-ni-Mit. the inner

וַיָּ֤רָם <S%H7311><s%> vai-Ya-rom went up כְּבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod- Then the glory יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from הַכְּר֔וּב <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-Ruv, from the cherub עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al unto מִפְתַּ֣ן <S%H4670><s%> mif-Tan [and stood] over the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; of the house וַיִּמָּלֵ֤א <S%H4390><s%> vai-yim-ma-Le was filled הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit and the house אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הֶ֣עָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan, with the cloud וְהֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> ve-he-cha-Tzer and the court מָֽלְאָ֔ה <S%H4390><s%> mal-'Ah, was full אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with נֹ֖גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> No-gah of the brightness כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod glory יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. God

וְקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> ve-kOl And the sound כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> kan-Fei wings הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim, of the cherubims' נִשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma' was heard עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer court הַחִיצֹנָ֑ה <S%H2435><s%> ha-chi-tzo-Nah; [even] to the outer כְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ke-Kol as the voice אֵל־ <S%H410><s%> 'el- God שַׁדַּ֖י <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai of the Almighty בְּדַבְּרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1696><s%> be-dab-be-Ro. when he speaketh

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came בְּצַוֹּתוֹ֙ <S%H6680><s%> be-tzav-vo-To And it came to pass [that] when he had commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish the man לְבֻֽשׁ־ <S%H3847><s%> le-vush- clothed הַבַּדִּים֙ <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim with linen לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying קַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> kach Take אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> mib-bei-Not between לַגַּלְגַּ֔ל <S%H1534><s%> lag-gal-Gal, from between the wheels מִבֵּינ֖וֹת <S%H996><s%> mib-bei-Not between לַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> lak-ke-ru-Vim; from between the cherubims וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo then he went in וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod, and stood אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel beside הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-Fan. the wheels

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach stretched forth הַכְּר֨וּב <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-Ruv And [one] cherub אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> mib-bei-Not between לַכְּרוּבִ֗ים <S%H3742><s%> lak-ke-ru-Vim, from between the cherubims אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh unto the fire אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּינ֣וֹת <S%H996><s%> bei-Not was between הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim, that [was] between the cherubims וַיִּשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa and took וַיִּתֵּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten, [thereof] and put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to חָפְנֵ֖י <S%H2651><s%> cha-fe-Nei [it] into the hands לְבֻ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> le-Vush of [him that was] clothed הַבַּדִּ֑ים <S%H906><s%> hab-bad-Dim; with linen וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach who took וַיֵּצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze. [it] and went out

וַיֵּרָ֖א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra And there appeared לַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> lak-ke-ru-Vim; in the cherubims תַּבְנִית֙ <S%H8403><s%> tav-Nit the form יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- hand אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of a man's תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under כַּנְפֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3671><s%> kan-fei-Hem. under their wings

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh, And when I looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah behold the four אוֹפַנִּים֮ <S%H212><s%> o-fan-Nim wheels אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel by הַכְּרוּבִים֒ <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim the cherubims אוֹפַ֣ן <S%H212><s%> o-Fan wheel אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one אֵ֚צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel by הַכְּר֣וּב <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-Ruv cherub אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one וְאוֹפַ֣ן <S%H212><s%> ve-'o-Fan wheel אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, and another אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel by הַכְּר֣וּב <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-Ruv cherub אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; another וּמַרְאֵה֙ <S%H4758><s%> u-mar-'Eh and the appearance הָא֣וֹפַנִּ֔ים <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-fan-Nim, of the wheels כְּעֵ֖ין <S%H5869><s%> ke-'Ein [was] as the colour אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'E-ven stone תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <S%H8658><s%> tar-Shish. of a beryl

וּמַ֨רְאֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4758><s%> u-Mar-'ei-Hem, And [as for] their appearances דְּמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut likeness אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ם <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tam; they four כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher if יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-Fan as if a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch had been in the midst הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-Fan. of a wheel

בְּלֶכְתָּ֗ם <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-Tam, moved אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אַרְבַּ֤עַת <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba-'at upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶם֙ <S%H7253><s%> riv-'ei-Hem sides יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu, went לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> yis-Sab-bu they turned בְּלֶכְתָּ֑ם <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-Tam; went כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki in הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom but to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִפְנֶ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> yif-Neh looked הָרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> ha-roSh whither the head אַחֲרָ֣יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav as they יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu, went לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> yis-Sab-bu it they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽם׃ <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-Tam. moved

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol their whole בְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ram And their whole body וְגַבֵּהֶ֔ם <S%H1354><s%> ve-gab-be-Hem, and their backs וִֽידֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> vi-dei-Hem and their hands וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3671><s%> ve-chan-fei-Hem; and their wings וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֗ים <S%H212><s%> ve-ha-'o-fan-Nim, and the wheels מְלֵאִ֤ים <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Im [were] full עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yim of eyes סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֖ם <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba'-Tam that they four אוֹפַנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H212><s%> o-fan-nei-Hem. [even] the wheels

לָא֖וֹפַנִּ֑ים <S%H212><s%> la-'o-fan-Nim; As for the wheels לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem קוֹרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> ko-Ra it was cried הַגַּלְגַּ֖ל <S%H1534><s%> hag-gal-Gal O wheel בְּאָזְנָֽי׃ <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nai. unto them in my hearing

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah had four פָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim faces לְאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> le-'e-Chad; And every one פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei face הָאֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad the first פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei [was] the face הַכְּר֗וּב <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-Ruv, of a cherub וּפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-Nei face הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni and the second פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei [was] the face אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of a man וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shi and the third פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the face אַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H738><s%> 'ar-Yeh, of a lion וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> ve-ha-re-vi-'I and the fourth פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei- the face נָֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H5404><s%> Na-sher. of an eagle

וַיֵּרֹ֖מּוּ <S%H7426><s%> vai-ye-Rom-mu were lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim; And the cherubims הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he הַחַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah, This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti that I saw בִּֽנְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> bin-har- by the river כְּבָֽר׃ <S%H3529><s%> ke-Var. of Chebar

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> u-ve-Le-chet moved הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim, And when the cherubims יֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-le-Chu go הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-fan-Nim the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <S%H681><s%> 'etz-Lam; by them וּבִשְׂאֵ֨ת <S%H5375><s%> u-vis-'Et lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֜ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim and when the cherubims אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כַּנְפֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3671><s%> kan-fei-Hem, their wings לָרוּם֙ <S%H7311><s%> la-Rum to mount up מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, from the earth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִסַּ֧בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> yis-Sab-bu turned הָאוֹפַנִּ֛ים <S%H212><s%> ha-'o-fan-Nim the same wheels גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem also מֵאֶצְלָֽם׃ <S%H681><s%> me-'etz-Lam. not from beside
